resources.string:
Thank you for downloading this app.
To get started, start your cmus with the correct parameters
 cmus with --listen 0.0.0.0
Then set a cmus password
 :passwd=yourpass
Now add your cmus host details to the settings in this app and hit the okay button.

This app was originally a fork of seriousben's cmus-droid-remote on github but has changed considerable.
The source for this app is hosted on github, feel free to check it out.

The awesome icons were kindly distributed by www.icons4android.com.

This is a work in progress, please allow your device to report any problems.
